attributes.action: Southeastern refund customers if trains cancelled or more then 5 minutes late
attributes.background: Southeastern rail is continuously cancelling trains and having delays more then 5 minutes which affects our journey to work. Cancelling trains is frustrating and for no apparent reason either. The service is getting worse,commuters refunded for cancelled trains and running more than 5 minutes late

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is an operational decision for Southeastern Rail, not for the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you like, you could sign this petition, which asks for the Government to reconsider Southeastern's rail franchise:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/166062
